creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: dark blue; 3/4 sleeves; asymmetrical front closure with silver bells as buttons; chest pocket on PR side with two predominately red tassels; isolated cross stitched geometric shapes, flower forms and hearts on front, sleeve cuffs, shoulders, top back and back hem; edged with metal coils strung on purple cording
medium: Cotton, synthetic fibers (?), metal bells, metal coils
title: Man's shirt
